page.title: 05Schooldays, Kidderminster
page.content: I wake on Friday, get dressed and eat my breakfast which is usually toast and a cup of tea. I walk to school through the park and occasionally play rounders or football. When I get to school I play tick until we go into school at 8.55 a.m. for registration. After that we go to the hall for assembly which is followed by hymn practice. At 10.00 a.m. we have English till break at 10.30. After break we Maths. and French till lunch. I have a school dinner and then go home for coffee or a cold drink. Afternoon school begins at 1.00 p.m. with Religious Education and Geography followed by break for ten minutes. After break we have English with a different teacher and History. School ends at 3.15 p.m.
